translation.en: Inspire and enlighten my path,
and direct my actions in this awe-inspiring mission.
translation.ko: 이 경외할 임무를 수행하는 제게 가르침을 주소서

translation.en: May the wisdom that descends always from your throne…
abide with me.
How many dead?
[Sergei] It is yet to be confirmed.
A hundred?
-More? -As I say, it is yet to be confirmed.
How many hundred?
Unfortunately, we are talking thousands-- Thousands?
It is yet to be confirmed.
We must cancel the celebrations.
I would advise against that.
But surely we must acknowledge the tragedy.
It is only a tragedy…
if you make it one.
Where you lead,
others follow.
[Montefiore] 2000, 3000 bodies of peasants
lie on this coronation field, where soon there are to be festivities,
the Czar, the Grand Duke, the Royal Family are to arrive.
translation.ko: 축제엔 차르, 대공, 황실 가족이 참석할 예정이었죠

translation.en: And some of the bodies they just pile into carts,
so that as the Royal Family are going out to the Khodynka Field,
translation.ko: 황실 가족은 마차로 호딘스코예 벌판에 도착해서

translation.en: they pass carriages where they think the people are waving at them,
translation.ko: 손을 흔드는 사람들 사이를 지나갈 예정이었죠

translation.en: and suddenly, as they get close, they realize
translation.ko: 그들이 가까이 접근해서야 시체임을 알게 하려던 거였어요

translation.en: that these are all dead people, crushed to death.
translation.ko: 그들이 가까이 접근해서야 시체임을 알게 하려던 거였어요 압사당한 사람들요

translation.en: Nicky should have done what a modern politician would do:
go to all the hospitals, and be seen
to be visiting and showing love for his people.
translation.ko: 국민에 대한 차르의 애정을 드러내야 했죠

translation.en: What he, in fact, does is to make a decision against his better judgment,
translation.ko: 하지만 니키는 자신이 옳다고 판단한 것과는 반대로

translation.en: to go to the party of the Marquis de Montebello, the French ambassador.
translation.ko: 프랑스 대사인 몬테벨로 후작의 연회에 참석합니다

translation.en: [Alix] I can't. It's not right.
Just this one, then we'll have done our duty.
translation.ko: 한 곡만 추자 그럼 할 일은 다 한 거야

translation.en: This will come back to haunt us.
There's no room for sentimentality in politics.
translation.ko: 정치엔 그런 감상에 빠질 여유 따윈 없다네

translation.en: You should have sent more Cossacks to manage the crowds.
The people won't forgive him.
Grow up.
This blood will stain his reign.
translation.ko: 오늘의 피가 니키의 치세에 오점이 될 거라고요

translation.en: Fucking kids.
[De Orellana] In the first day of his reign,
the Czar and his German wife were dancing and drinking,
translation.ko: 차르와 독일인 아내는 춤추고 술을 마셨죠

translation.en: even as hundreds and thousands of Muscovites had been killed.
translation.ko: 수천 명의 모스크바 시민이 죽었는데 말입니다

translation.en: [Montefiore] And from this point onwards, he is known as Nicholas the Bloody.
It's a disastrous beginning to Nicholas' reign.
[Rasputin] Friend.
Would you have food and a bed for the night?
-Of course. -Thank you.
Very nice, thank you.
What's all this shaking, old man?
Too many seasons.
Feel God flow in you again.
That's it. That's it.
[whispering] Breathe his spirit.
Remember how they ran.
The hills they climbed.
It's all still there.
Good.
-Huh? -Good.
[Smith] Rasputin becomes more and more convinced of his own abilities,
translation.ko: 라스푸틴은 갈수록 자신의 능력을 확신하게 됩니다

translation.en: of his power as a healer…
his insight into human nature.
[Montefiore] He's superb at getting close to people. He has empathy.
translation.ko: 라스푸틴은 친화력이 뛰어났어요 공감 능력이 있었죠

translation.en: He has a feral charisma.
[Smith] And then he has those eyes.
And he knows the effect that these eyes have on people.
translation.ko: 라스푸틴은 자신의 눈빛이 남들에게 갖는 힘을 알았어요

translation.en: Especially women.
It's all right to sin.
It brings us closer to God.
How can you be redeemed if you haven't sinned?
[Smith] He's a man who emits electricity from his fingertips.
translation.ko: 라스푸틴은 손가락 끝으로 전류를 발산하는 사내였어요

translation.en: His physical presence is something that overwhelms people.
translation.ko: 같이 있는 것만으로 사람들을 압도하는 힘이 있었죠

translation.en: And people are transfixed by this.
[Montefiore] By 1901, Nicky and Alix have three daughters:
Olga, Tatiana, and Maria.
And when Alix gets pregnant again…
[Botkin] Breathe.
…everybody is longing for the much-needed son and heir.
translation.ko: 반드시 필요한 후계자, 아들이길 모두가 고대했습니다

translation.en: Oh, Lord, forgive us our sins.
May our prayers be answered.
We thank you for our daughters, but may you bless us now with a son.
translation.ko: 딸을 주신 것에 감사드리니 이제 아들로 축복하소서

translation.en: -[Botkin] Push! Push it! -[shouts]
Tell me. [panting]
We have a beautiful, healthy baby.
[gasps] I'm sorry!
A son would belong to the people.
This little girl is ours.
Hello, Anastasia.
[Pierre] In Greek,
the name Anastasia means, "the one who is reborn."
Now I had to ask if she truly had been resurrected.
translation.ko: 이제 저 여자가 정말 부활한 건지 물어봐야 했다

translation.en: The eyes are the same.
But not the face.
There may be good reasons for that.
Her jaw's been broken.
She has missing teeth.
She's been through serious emotional and physical trauma.
translation.ko: 정서적, 육체적으로 심한 충격을 당한 상태죠

translation.en: I don't know if anyone could have survived that massacre.
[Pierre] One thing that is certain
is that the birth of Anastasia was both a blessing and a curse.
translation.ko: 아나스타시야의 탄생은 축복인 동시에 저주였단 거다

translation.en: More than ever, Nicholas and Alexandra needed a son and heir.
translation.ko: 그 어느 때보다 니콜라이와 알렉산드라에겐 후계자가 될 아들이 절실했다

translation.en: [whispers] Come back to bed.
We need help.
[Pierre] And their desperation would open a door…
[Alix] There must be something we can do.
…to a darkness that would destroy their world.
translation.ko: 그들의 세상을 파괴할 어둠의 문을 열게 된다

translation.en: There must be someone.
